Dervish:
Small, fast machine that sacrifices armour and
heavy weapons for a high maximum speed and
improved manoeuvring.
Deathbringer:
A titan. Heavily armoured with dual heavy
weapon slots, but slow and unable to equip 
more than a single equipment module.
Autogun:
Rapid-fire automatic ballistic weapon that
chips away gradually at enemy armour.
Coilgun:
Electromagnetically-propelled high-explosive
shell launcher. Slow-firing but effective.
Light Laser:
Medium-range, high-accuracy beam weapon.
Deals moderate damage over time.
Heavy Laser:
Medium-range, high-accuracy beam weapon.
Deals heavy damage over time.
Shotgun:
High-spread, slow-firing ballistic weapon.
Lethal at close range.
Dumb Missile:
Missile swarm with rudimentary guidance
steers to where it is aimed on launch.
Homing Missile:
Missile swarm with smarter guidance steers
to a target locked by the pilot before launch.
Force Barrier:
Kinetic barrier that absorbs a portion of incoming
weapons damage at the cost of an equivalent
amount of energy.
Jump Jets:
By venting jets of reactor plasma, propel yourself
skywards. Also uses lateral thrusters to increase
turning rate while active.
ArmaGel Unit:
A capillary system in your armour plating
distributes a nanite/ceramic epoxy that fills in
and regenerates damaged armour in the field.
Emergency Battery:
Accelerates energy cache recharge using spare
power from the emergency battery's stores.
Good for prolonged firefights.
Active Cooling:
Accelerates reactor cooling by venting coolant
and replacing it with fresh coolant from its
stores. Cannot be replenished once depleted.
